channel.title: I get the message "could not save" on logout
channel.description:
Everytime someone logs out on my server the following comes up on the server:
[code]Could not save for shaunshorty4 Could not save for shaunshorty4 ClientHandler: Client shaunshorty4 disconnected.[/code]
Tell me any more information you might need, thanks in advanced to anyone who can help me.

item.title: I get the message "could not save" on logout
item.dc:creator: @shaunshorty4 shaunshorty4
item.description:
@shaunshorty4 wrote:

Oh, if you have a source for the server, run it and in the client just type in your ip for the server ip. Make sure you have port forwarding enabled on your router. And the no-ip thing lets you have an address redirected to your ip so people will type that in the server ip when they log in to your server. Those are the basics, there are much more simpler ways to do it but that will be the easier way to understand.

Read full topic
item.source: I get the message "could not save" on logout

item.title: I get the message "could not save" on logout
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

No No what I was asking you was off topic not your post, I was wondering if you coded your whole server, plus no-ip and everything all by yourself, because I am having trouble making mine appear online, so I can post it on server status page

Read full topic

item.title: I get the message "could not save" on logout
item.dc:creator: @shaunshorty4 shaunshorty4
item.description:
@shaunshorty4 wrote:

Sorry, thought I was posting this in the right section. I’m using a source I found on the internet for my server, I’ve worked out pretty much all the basics, just a few bugs I need to find out how to fix. It connects with other players fine, and it does save all data and character information, its just on log out it cannot save.

Read full topic
